jetset.template_model Module¶

Module: model_template¶

Overview¶

This module provides an interface handle the template model

Classes relations¶

Classes and Inheritance Structure¶

Module API¶

Summary¶

Template(template_type[, z, nu_size]) Class to handle spectral templates
TemplateParameter(template, **keywords) This class is a subclass of the ModelParameter class, extending the base class to Template parameters.
